text: @tdpauw @holly_cummins It _could_ be #ContinuousDelivery if your product demand is really 6 months. If it is, you have a constraint in sales/marketing  more serious than technology

author.name: Steve Smith
author.description: Leadership | Continuous Delivery | Operability | Scale | Books at https://t.co/U7dd6kt3yo | Blog at https://t.co/WfTUBNDFOu | Works at https://t.co/PRdOgUB8bG
